pT: Miss Kuroitsu from the Monster Development Department

1.pT: She Cried Inside When the Monster to Strike Fear Into the Hearts of Men Was Born Into the Evil Secret Society Plotting World Domination

2.pT: The Legendary Emissary from Hell Who Constantly Hears the Screams of The Evil Souls Supping from The Kettle of Darkness Spreads Fear in His Wake as He Awakens

3.pT: The Monster in a Perpetual Cycle of Death and Rebirth Struggles to Break Its Chains Until Seduced by a Soul Entrapped by Destiny

4.pT: The Soul of a Demon Drinking into a Stupor at a Banquet of Illusions While Burdened by Sins That Lead All Men Astray Shatters with Anger When the Young Maiden Cries

5.pT: Saved by a Smile from the Deadly Price Typically Extracted Through Deals with Monsters That Dwell in the Deep Like a True Ring of Solomon

6.pT: An Unsophisticated Soul Tormented by Powers Unseen Succumbs to Brimming Anger and Yearning to Manifest as a Malevolent Beast

7.pT: The Result of Passions Served up at a Monsters' Banquet Engulfed in a Sweet-Smelling Embrace of Honeyed Poison While Drowning in Sin with an Avatar of God

8.pT: The Sheer Malevolence of the Denizens that Dwell in the Castle of the Dead Seeds Mutual Fear and Hostility Among Their Wicked Rank

9.pT: The Rotting but Heroic Figures of Ancient Souls of the Dead that Congregate in the Abyss Find a Ray of Hope in the Darkness from Pride Pulled from Another Time

10.pT: The Very Concept of the Evil Being that Bewitches Souls Summons New Demons through the Chaos it Brings when it Drowns in Turmoil Over its Puzzling Existence

11.pT: The Sacrifice Willingly Attending the Banquet of Evil Gods Must Either Be Eaten and Accept Their Role as Sacrifice or Devour the Evil Gods and So Become One

12.pT: Those Sacrifices Saved from Hell by a Black-Winged Devil That Devours Other Devils Will Revere It as God Regardless of Whether Its Act Makes It a Servant of Heaven or Merely a Savage Cannibal
